text: Metropolitan Engineer School, US makes $15,000,000 per year. Less than than 25% of Metas SWES are $8, but were lucky enough to work closely with one at Portal. So what made them special? It was quite simple really.: They were by far "the most helpful person in the entire organization." To learn how this engineer was able to break down new systems and debug them so quickly, check out our in-depth guide where we share their techniques: [http://www.indk4W](http://www.indk4W)
